title: Warm vegan Vietnamese rice rolls with chilli peanut sauce
ingredients: ['4 carrots', '4 tablespoons toasted sesame oil or coconut oil', '1 red pepper', '1 red onion', '1 squash', '5 cloves garlic', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon basil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 packet rice paper rolls', '4 tablespoons smooth peanut butter', '4 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon chilli flakes']
